p.span: Hamburg Central School District has a confirmed case of COVID

p.span: ) in Hamburg High schools on March 9, 2020, we are aware of concerns in the

p.span: this relatively new virus. Please see letter below from the Superintendent regarding positive case at our High School.

p.span: The district is closely monitoring this fluid situation and following guidance from the US Centers

p.span: for Disease Control (CDC), and the New York State Department of Health (NYSDOH), Erie

span.style: left: 515.483px; top: 351.813px; font-size: 20px; transform: scaleX(0.897156); font-family: sans-serif;

p.span:
We will use this page to communicate information on the virus as we receive it.

March 30, 2020 - Update from Superintendent
